meanings.definition: The force or potential difference that drives an electric current.
meanings.sent1: The voltage in the battery powers the toy car.
meanings.sent2: The electrician measured the voltage to ensure safety.
meanings.sent3: The voltage in the wire was feeling a bit shocked today.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was like a high voltage wire, electrifying everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The voltage surged through the circuit, lighting up the room with energy.

meanings.definition: A measure of electrical potential energy.
meanings.sent1: The voltage of the battery indicated it was fully charged.
meanings.sent2: The scientist calculated the voltage of the experiment to predict its outcome.
meanings.sent3: The voltage of the lightning bolt was off the charts!
meanings.sent4: His determination was a voltage that powered him through the tough times.
meanings.sent5: The voltage stored in the capacitor was ready to be released in a burst of energy.
